description: Details required for Condition 13 (Landscape) of planning permission 22/02199/FUL (Application under Section 73A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission ref: 20/01970/FUL (Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of Planning Application ref:18/14294/FUL (Demolition of the existing detached bungalow and the erection of two 5 bedroom detached houses, with associated vehicular access, off-street parking, and landscaping) dated 18/05/2018. Alterations to include changes to fascia materials and fenestration positions) dated 18/11/2020. Variation to include alteration of parking space positions and relocation of vehicle crossover, provide the correct legal segregation of each dwellings demise, locate parking spaces away from RPA and provision of maximum cable length distance for electric charging points from the dwellings to each vehicle)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The Landscape Plan as submitted would cause conflict with the development permitted and as such the details submitted in relation to condition 13 of planning permisson 22/02199/FUL are not acceptable.
